title: OpenAI has released its first research into how using ChatGPT affects people’s emotional wellbeing
summary: OpenAI says over 400 million people use ChatGPT every week. But how does interacting with it affect us? Does it make us more or less lonely? These are some of the questions OpenAI set out to investigate, in partnership with the MIT Media Lab, in a pair of new studies.  They found that only a…

title: Putting Private AI Governance into Action

summary: There has never been a more pressing time for food producers to harness technology to tackle the sector’s tough mission. title: When you might start speaking to robots
summary: Last Wednesday, Google made a somewhat surprising announcement.
